name: Correct cavity size, Cavity clean & clear of mortar
Brick ties, correct fixings grade and spacings
Brick shelf angles correct type & position
Fixings to angles correct type, size & position
Weep, breathing holes in place, clear, vent gaps
Work area left clean & damage free
10mm gap from brick work to aluminium joinery.
Final check to ensure no other trades have damaged the brick work
Correct steel size, tied and placed
Block lintels correct steel type & position
Block fill correct Mpa & additives if specified
Control Joints. Correct steel R16, Denzo tape, Position.
Final check to ensure no other trades have damaged the block work
